titleStmt.title: An epistle for true love, unity, and order in the Church of Christ, against the spirit of discord, disorder and confusion &c. recommended to friends in truth, chiefly for the sake of the weak and unstable minded ... / by Anne Whitehead, Mary Elson.
titleStmt.author: Whitehead, Anne, 1624-1686.
Elson, Mary, 1623 or 4-1707.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
